
constructor(node - according to MM)
form constructor(node, divID, iframe, screenWidth, screenHeight)
combobox constructor(node, groupname)

w.type - string, lower-case

w.setEventHandler(f)
  f(event)
    event: {source:node, name:"Click", data:specific}

w.load()

w.reload(node)

<- w.getBounds() according to IMCDialogLaoyout

w.layout(x,y,w,h)

w.destroy()


w.readOnly - can be set to true
